hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT [AOID] as Id ,[AOGUID] as IdGiud ,[FORMALNAME] as fName ,[SHORTNAME] as sName ,[PARENTGUID] as parId FROM [fias_ADDROBJ] WHERE [AOLEVEL] IN (7) AND [ACTSTATUS] = 1 AND [PARENTGUID] = :ParentId AND [FORMALNAME] like :StartWith
SELECT [AOID] as Id ,[AOGUID] as IdGiud ,[FORMALNAME] as fName ,[SHORTNAME] as sName ,[PARENTGUID] as parId FROM [fias_ADDROBJ] WHERE [AOLEVEL] IN (7) AND [ACTSTATUS] = 1 AND [AOID] = :Id
